name: SPINARREL
description:
You play as a turret that cannot move and also cannot stop spinning. Evil purple gems are somehow attracted to you.

Press [SPACE] to shoot the evil gems away. Survive as long as you can.

Good luck!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits:

===== MUSIC =================

 "8 Bit Select" By HeatleyBros

"8 Bit Evil" By HeatleyBros (sped up 1.25x in game)

===== FONTS =================
